i'm a little bit of everything, depending on the time... i've studied architecture and mathematics but my interests reach far and wide beyond. i'd say i'm a jack of all trades, a polymath in training. i love all things open-source. i believe in dignity for everyone. i am an advocate for accessibility. drug positive, but i'm going natural for a while now. i used to be hypersexual, now i'm kinda celibate. i enjoy engaging with philosophy. i am full of love and also full of anger. currently recovering from a series of horrific events in my life. working as a software tester in hungary rn, my goal is to get some experience & leave this country preferably in the next 2 years. (are these things weird to put in a bio? probably, but i hadn't talked to anyone in ages so i am a little weird rn. + i can always rewrite it + i come here to be weird) sorry if i don't answer to a reply or a mention - sometimes i run out of words âˆ§/âˆ¨ forget to reply.

i've been on tumblr for 11+ years, now i'm trying to settle in the fediverse. this is my main account where i girlblog and shitpost and share my litte thoughts. my other fedi account is @fizzymuse@mastodon.world - i plan to culture/museumpost there, check it out if you want to!
